attributes.action: Keep Brittania on the the 50P  Coin
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Britannia has been an enduring symbol of British pride and history and is about to be replaced on coinage, together with the Heraldic symbols used on other coins

rejection.details: There is already a similar petition at: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/50pence/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
